sentences.sContent: Only one youth survived–a pilgrim who had come as an acolyte, seeking wisdom, but had yet to be admitted to the monastery.
sentences.sContent_eng: Only one youth survived–a pilgrim who had come as an acolyte, seeking wisdom, but had yet to be admitted to the monastery.
sentences.sCn: 只有一个人幸免于难，他是来星隐寺寻求智慧，却尚未得到寺院认可的侍僧。

remMethod.val: “爱过来的” → 爱过来帮忙的人 → 助手

trans.tranOther: someone who serves a leader or believes in their ideas
